backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing users, fields, and tasks with role-based access control and CRUD operations including backgroundColor on fields.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old field data to new format by adding a default backgroundColor field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and recent changes of all major frontend components.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Checklist for validating builds, deployments, login flow, and core functionality in local and production environments.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide documenting reproducible steps for diagnosing field creation failures, especially for anonymous users.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook outlining steps for performing a clean production redeploy with verification and prerequisites.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template for recording production smoke test results covering login, dashboard, CRUD flows, and export/import.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Explains a profile-save race condition after login, its root cause, reproduction steps, implemented guards and error normalization, and validation tests.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading bootstrap and main scripts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor/profile boot logic, error states, and routing to login, setup, or dashboard.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Implements a pre-React boot error UI with sanitized error details and copy‑ready diagnostics.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Sets up global shims and environment variables before React loads and initializes boot fallback handlers.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Task list view supporting search, sorting, field lookup, and loading states using task and field queries.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog component for creating a new field, handling authentication, actor readiness, and background selection.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a task within a field, including scales, duration settings, and dependency selection.
Dialog for editing a field's name, icon, color, and background with updates persisted via mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task's attributes, duration, dependencies, and optionally moving it to another field.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Card UI showing a field’s name, icon, task count, and aggregated attribute metrics with styled background.
Detailed view of a field showing sortable/filterable tasks, field stats, and controls for creating, editing, or deleting the field.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with a copyright notice and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with theme toggle, user avatar menu, and logout handling based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Confirmation dialog warning users before overwriting all fields and tasks during data import.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Shows a login card with feature list and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user name, with authentication and backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Displays a recoverable boot error with retry, logout options, and expandable diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button to toggle ascending or descending sort direction with tooltip.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Card UI for viewing, completing, editing, and deleting a task, including attributes and dependency handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags. Handles AuthClient creation and restores identities from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, fields, tasks, and data export/import, with detailed error handling and identity‑aware caching. Integrates backend actor calls and normalizes backend error cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, retrying only on network errors and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes. Ensures actor availability once identity initialization completes.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme color variables, including custom field background colors. Applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global styles and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI with field listing, sorting, searching, authentication‑gated actions, and import/export features. Coordinates queries, actor readiness, and selection state for fields and tasks.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities to extract error text, detect specific IC error types, and generate safe user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Exports objects as downloadable JSON files with BigInt handling and automatic filename generation.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Converts durations between units, formats total minutes, and provides helper functions for consistent time handling.
Normalizes errors during user data export into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines icon and color presets for fields and provides lookup helpers with defaults.
Provides predefined field card background options with helpers for lookup and CSS variable mapping.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field creation errors using category detection and safe message extraction.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and parses exported JSON payloads, restoring types like Principals and BigInts with defaults for missing visual fields.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes profile save errors into categorized, user-friendly messages by detecting login, actor, authorization, and unknown cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to dashboard field card layout and background color options.
